channel.title: A couple things that i need help with
channel.description: I'm wondering on how to make it so my ingame highscores features all saved players, not just players that are online? And also the one that is necessary to fix, when someone puts on the turmoil prayer and uses leech strength, the turmoil prayer deactivates, when i use turmoil and hit leech special the turmoil is still on ,how do imake it so it de-activates ? i can't find it anywhere

item.title: A couple things that i need help with
item.dc:creator: @IDB IDB
item.description:

I’m wondering on how to make it so my ingame highscores features all saved players, not just players that are online?
